entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought it like two weeks ago. I'm already regretting it.
I understand. I'm happy to help with your return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
Ugh, one sec... Okay, it's [customer email address]. It's about this stupid VeloBand Pulse.
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see you purchased a VeloBand Pulse on [date 15 days ago]. What seems to be the problem with the device?
It just doesn't work for me! The heart rate tracking is garbage, and it's uncomfortable to wear. I want my money back. This whole smart watch thing was a mistake.

I'm sorry to hear you're not satisfied with the VeloBand Pulse. At VeloFit, we strive for customer satisfaction. Our standard return policy is 90 days from the date of purchase. Since you're well within that timeframe, we can process your return.
Ninety days? Really? Okay, good. Because I was about to lose it. I thought I was going to be stuck with this thing. So, what do I do now?

Alright. I can generate a prepaid shipping label for you. You'll receive an email with instructions on how to print it and ship the VeloBand Pulse back to us. Once we receive the returned item, we'll issue a full refund to your original method of payment. The refund process usually takes about 7 to 10 days.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Do I need to talk to a manager or anything like that?

No, that won't be necessary. I have the authorization to process your return. I'll go ahead and send that email with the return label right now. Just a reminder, our return policy covers you for a full 90 days on most items.
Great! Thank you so much! I appreciate your help. I was worried I'd be stuck with this useless thing. It's good to know there's a return policy in place.
You're very welcome. I'm glad I could assist you. Is there anything else I can help you with today regarding the VeloBand Pulse or any other VeloFit products?
You're welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
